summary: This document is an email chain regarding a letter motion filed by the USA in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell (1:20-cr-00330-AJN) concerning the authentication of birth certificates. It includes a notice of electronic filing listing the attorneys involved in the case.

events.title: Filing of Letter Motion on Birth Certificates
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office files a letter motion addressed to Judge Alison J. Nathan regarding the authentication of birth certificates in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Dating of AUSA Letter Motion
events.description: Assistant U.S. Attorneys date a letter motion concerning birth certificate authentication.

locations: U.S. District Court Southern District of New York
keyFacts: A letter motion regarding the authentication of birth certificates was filed by the prosecution in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case (1:20-cr-00330-AJN) on November 22, 2021.
Defense attorney Christian Everdell corresponded with the prosecution about filing a response to this motion, referencing a potential exhibit GX-52.
The notice of electronic filing lists numerous attorneys of record for Ghislaine Maxwell, including Bobbi C Sternheim, David Boies, and Christian Everdell, indicating a large defense team.
The document is an automated court system email showing procedural activity, specifically a filing by the USA against Ghislaine Maxwell.
